content:
Here are sample questions 31-40 for a hypothetical AWS Certified DevOps Engineer certification exam:

1. Which AWS service is used to automate compliance checking of AWS resources?
a) AWS Security Hub
b) AWS GuardDuty
c) AWS Config
d) AWS Shield
2. Which AWS service can be used to create and manage APIs?
a) Amazon API Gateway
b) AWS Lambda
c) AWS AppSync
d) Amazon CloudFront
3. Which AWS service can be used to create and manage virtual machines?
a) Amazon EC2
b) Amazon ECS
c) Amazon EKS
d) Amazon ECR
4. Which AWS service can be used to automate the deployment of containerized applications?
a) Amazon ECS
b) Amazon EKS
c) AWS Fargate
d) AWS Lambda
5. Which AWS service is used to store and manage data lakes?
a) Amazon S3
b) Amazon RDS
c) Amazon Glacier
d) Amazon Athena
6. Which AWS service is used to create and manage scalable file storage?
a) Amazon S3
b) Amazon EFS
c) Amazon FSx
d) Amazon Glacier
7. Which AWS service is used to monitor and troubleshoot network connectivity issues?
a) Amazon VPC
b) AWS Transit Gateway
c) AWS VPN
d) AWS Direct Connect
8. Which AWS service can be used to implement scalable and reliable email delivery?
a) Amazon SNS
b) Amazon SES
c) Amazon SQS
d) AWS Lambda
9. Which AWS service can be used to perform automated security assessments of running EC2 instances?
a) AWS Security Hub
b) AWS Config
c) AWS Inspector
d) AWS Shield
10. Which AWS service is used to create and manage DNS zones and records?
a) Amazon Route 53
b) AWS CloudFront
c) AWS Global Accelerator
d) AWS Firewall Manager

These sample questions are intended to provide a general idea of the types of topics and skills that could be covered on a hypothetical AWS Certified DevOps Engineer certification exam. However, candidates are encouraged to review the exam blueprint and study the relevant AWS services and best practices to prepare for the actual exam.
